title: Sollaayo Vaithirandhu Lyrics Mogamul
stanzas:
nillaayo neeril vandhu
naan azhaikka
neeril vandhu
oonjal manam andraadam
unnodu mandradum velai.

Sollaayo vaaithirandhu
vaarthai ondru
podhum ingu
kannaana kannaa
un pollaadha leelai
Sollaayo vaaithirandhu

thoondilil puzhuvaaga
thirumaeni vaada
thaamatham ini yaeno
iru maeni kooda.

andhi varum, thendral sudum
oor viragam viragam ezhum.

endru varum, inba sugam
oon urugum urugum dhinam

naal muzhuthum
ovvoru pozhudhum
un vannangal ennangal
nenjukkul niraindhidum

naalthorum paarvaiyil
naan vidum thoodhu
kooraadho naan padum
paadugal nooru.

naan oru aandaalo
thiruppaavai paada
yezhaiyai vidalaamo
idhupola vaada

velli nira vennilavil
venguzhalin isaiyum varum.
nalliravil mellisaiyil
thaen alaigal ninaivil ezhum

oorjithaiyam unnaal ilagum
innerathil kannaa
un mounathai thavirthu
